channel.title: Blog on PY563
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on PY563

item.title: Memoirs
item.description: Memoirs is a google blogspot where i share personal experiences and stories. These posts are mostly regular life updates and discussions. If intrested do follow the blog here.

item.title: Learing IELTS at A Washed-up Nerd
item.description: I planned to relocate as a resident to Canada from the USA after living for about six years in Boston, MA. In this IELTS learning blog, I review the resources that were helpful in improving writing skills and other free learning series on the internet which were promising and guided me to attain 8 and 9 bands. The blog is built on popular static static genarator framework Hugo from an open sourced theme.
